name: Your Turn To Roll
description:
You're playing DnD and the only way to defeat enemies is the bane of all DMs - rolling the dice onto the battle map and knocking over the miniatures! 

To defeat the enemies you must line up your roll correctly and try and hit as many goblins as possible. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Each Mouse Button shoots one of three dice 

Move the mouse to aim the trajectory of each dice 

---------------------------------------------------------------------

This is our submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2022 which was developed to the theme of "Roll of the Dice" 

We hope you enjoy it and would love to hear any feedback!
